ca.mcgill.ecse211.finalproject

Class MainController

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • ca.mcgill.ecse211.finalproject.MainController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class MainController
extends java.lang.Thread
    Main controller This class is the main thread of the program and the root of the state machine that will control every action.
    Author:
    Justin Tremblay

    • Constructor Detail

      • MainController

        public MainController(Localizer loc,
              UltrasonicLocalizer ul,
              LightLocalizer ll,
              Navigator nav,
              ZipLine zip,
              Searcher srch)
        Constructor
        Parameters:
        loc - Localizer object, manages the localization of the robot.
        ul - Ultrasonic localizer, works with the Localizer class to localize the robot.
        ll - Light localizer, works with the Localizer class to localize the robot.
        nav - Navigator, handles navigating the robot through sets of waypoints as well as avoiding obstacles.
        zip - Zipline controller, handles crossing the zip line.
        srch - Searcher object, works with the navigator to look for the 'flag'.
